Token.Abstract: For those who wish to use their own logging system or report metrics to non-Virtuoso locations/trackers. Virtuoso will send all log events to the registered delegate if the VirtuosoLogger would have otherwise processed them.
Reports that a tracked event was logged.

Parameter.Name: fileID
Parameter.Abstract: The UUID of the relevant asset. Nil for events that don't relate to a specific asset.

Parameter.Name: bearer
Parameter.Abstract: The network type relating to the event. kVL_Invalid for events that don't relate to the network state.

Parameter.Name: data
Parameter.Abstract: A numeric value semantically unique to the specific event. Will be 0 when not required. Example: For the download-paused event, contains total bytes downloaded so far for this asset.

Token.Abstract: Reports that a tracked event was logged.

Parameter.Name: fileID
Parameter.Abstract: The UUID of the relevant asset. Nil for events that don't relate to a specific asset.

Parameter.Name: bearer
Parameter.Abstract: The network type relating to the event. kVL_Invalid for events that don't relate to the network state.

Parameter.Name: data
Parameter.Abstract: A string value semantically unique to the specific event.

Token.Abstract: Reports on a custom event not tracked by the standard event list.

Parameter.Name: event
Parameter.Abstract: An NSDictionary containing the logged event data

Parameter.Name: data
Parameter.Abstract: A string containing the debug event data

Parameter.Name: level
Parameter.Abstract: The severity level of the log item
